Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I need to understand the task The user wants me to create an accepting Petri net for an insurance claim management process using pm4py The process includes various steps like Claim Registration Document Verification Fraud Check etc with loops for re submission of documents and in depth investigations

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Key elements Places Represent states between activities Transitions Represent activities labeled with their names Arcs Connect places and transitions to form the sequence

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The process flow 1 Start with Claim Filing C 2 Then Claim Registration CR 3 Then Document Verification DV If documents are incomplete loop to Re Document Submission RDS and back to DV 4 After DV Fraud Check FC If fraud suspected loop to In depth Investigation II and back to FC 5 Then Claim Assessment CA 6 If claim amount high Approval AP Otherwise skip AP to Payment P

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: For conditional approval after CA have a place Assessment Complete Then from this place two transitions one labeled AP for high amounts and one labeled P for low amounts

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: For DV loop after DV place After DV then from that place two transitions one for Complete to FC and one for Incomplete to RDS Then after RDS go back to Before DV

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: Problem decision transitions labeled Complete Incomplete not activities cannot use new activities must use given ones C CR DV RDS FC II CA AP P N CL

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In Petri nets choice modeled by place with multiple output transitions nondeterministic but for modeling acceptable

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Label decision transitions with next activities eg from After DV transition labeled FC to Before FC transition labeled RDS to Before RDS from After RDS transition labeled DV to Before DV

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Use input places before activities Before DV Before FC etc with multiple input arcs from normal flow and loops
